      • transform

        public java.util.ArrayList<org.javatuples.Quartet<java.lang.String,java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer,org.javatuples.Pair<org.javatuples.Pair<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer>,java.lang.Integer>>> transform(SemanticRuleEngine obj,
                                                                                                                                                                                                        java.lang.String[] tokens,
                                                                                                                                                                                                        java.lang.String[] tags,
                                                                                                                                                                                                        int[] tag_index,
                                                                                                                                                                                                        java.util.ArrayList sents_token_map,
                                                                                                                                                                                                        java.lang.String section,
                                                                                                                                                                                                        java.io.BufferedWriter out,
                                                                                                                                                                                                        java.lang.String if_drool_engine)
                                                                                                                                                                                                          throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Update the tags based on a set of predefined rules
        Parameters:
        obj - an instance of class "semanticRuleEngine"
        tokens - token list e.g. {"warfarin", "50", "mg", "po"}
        tags - tag list generated by dictionary-lookup algorithm e.g. {"DIN", "TK", "DOSEUNIT", "RUT"}
        tag_index - index of tag e.g. {0, 1, 2, 3}
        sents_token_map -
        Returns:
        a list of tagging result
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        See Also:
        SemanticRuleEngine

      • RegTagger

        public java.util.ArrayList<org.javatuples.Quartet<java.lang.String,java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer,org.javatuples.Pair<org.javatuples.Pair<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer>,java.lang.Integer>>> RegTagger(SemanticRuleEngine obj,
                                                                                                                                                                                                        java.lang.String[] tokens,
                                                                                                                                                                                                        java.lang.String[] tags,
                                                                                                                                                                                                        int[] tag_index,
                                                                                                                                                                                                        java.util.ArrayList sents_token_map)
                                                                                                                                                                                                          throws java.io.IOException
        Tagging the tokens by list of regular expression and merged the result into the one generated with the dictionary-lookup
        Parameters:
        obj - an instance of class "semanticRuleEngine"
        tokens - token list e.g. {"warfarin", "50", "mg", "po"}
        tags - tag list generated by dictionary-lookup algorithm e.g. {"DIN", "TK", "DOSEUNIT", "RUT"}
        tag_index - index of tag e.g. {0, 1, 2, 3}
        sents_token_map -
        Returns:
        a list of tagging result
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        See Also:
        SemanticRuleEngine

      • regexTagger

        private org.javatuples.Triplet<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String,java.lang.String> regexTagger(SemanticRuleEngine obj,
                                                                                      int start,
                                                                                      java.lang.String strtokens)
                                                                                         throws java.io.IOException
        A regular expression based semantic tagger
        Parameters:
        obj - an instance of class "semanticRuleEngine"
        start - start index
        strtokens - search string
        Returns:
        a list that contains three items: 1>offset of end position of identified tag("-1", if no tag found), 2>tagged phrase 3> tagged type
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        See Also:
        SemanticRuleEngine

      • medicationContext

        private java.util.ArrayList<org.javatuples.Quartet<java.lang.String,java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer,org.javatuples.Pair<org.javatuples.Pair<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer>,java.lang.Integer>>> medicationContext(SemanticRuleEngine obj,

                                                                                                                                                                                                                java.lang.String section)
        This method is for anti-context rules to remove false positives. It will check single drug in a non-medication section for anti-context rules.
        Parameters:
        ttags - output from the method "medicationTransformer"
        section - current section name
        Returns:
        updated tagging result
